class_notes: This course serves as an introduction to the theory and practice of ethnography in ethnomusicology. Through focused reading and creative fieldwork exercises, students will develop their understanding of ethnographic research methodologies and approaches to representing musical experience through writing.
course_description: This course examines the theories and methodologies in the field of ethnomusicology, with a focus on how it intersects with other disciplines and the broader social content.
prerequisites: MUS 200 or MUS_OX 200 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1314, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: M. Schweig, Status: Open
